entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer for BCL to prevent exposing non-struct GetEnumerator #95250
  • [System.Text.Json] Serializer loses precision on ulong #95243
  • Is it possible to optimize Array.IndexOf(...) for Type? #95242
  • Native AOT - Static PGO MIBC passed to crossgen2 appears to be ignored #95236

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'interval->isSpilled' during 'LSRA allocate' #66578
    9.0.0
  • RyuJIT: reconsider arm32 callfinally code pattern #59453
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' during profile synthesis #95199
  • Uuuh I caught linux-x86 on dotnet 7.0 #95240
  • PeriodicTimer the first tick is instantaneous #95238

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Factor SSA's DFS and profile synthesis's loop finding #95251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove questionable transformation #95249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [DataTable] Optimize [NameNode/ConstNode] [=|!=|>|<|>=|<=] [NameNode/ConstNode] filtering #95247
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code (HashIdentity) #95246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Switch arm32 call-finally to be similar to other targets #95117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace usage of BITS_IN_BYTE with BITS_PER_BYTE #95241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix LSRA handling of arm32 double registers and spilling #94947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip EH table for inlinees in fgDfsReversePostorder #95200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump dependencies of markdownlint action #95215
    area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Fix incremental servicing condition #95197
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] DaysInMonth optimization #95229
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Improve `.Distinct().ToList()` and `.Union(e).ToList()` #95224
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: Assert bbJumpKind in BasicBlock::HasJump #95152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (2/N) #95233
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95216
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95217
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable implicit rejection for RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 #95218
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • Optimize "implied relops" in assertprop #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Flush-to-zero behavior for float-to-int conversion #94762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AA_3A to IF_SVE_HL_3A #95127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix invalid parameters in SetFileInformationByHandle #95235
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTTP Gone (410) In `Http.Results` APIs #52381
  • Add HttpConnetAttribute #52380
  • Access `AuthenticationStateProvider` in outgoing request middleware #52379
  • Perf regression: json #52378
  • HTTP Gone (410) In `Http.Results` APIs #52376
  • Error on Blazor FileInput upload - The format of value '' is invalid #52375
  • ./restore.cmd error #52374
  • .NET 8 blazor .wasm Lazy Loaded Assemblies throws runtime exception and fails to load #52373
  • "Error: Cannot advance beyond the end of the Sibling array" appears when streaming rendering subcomponents #52371
  • Net8 uses the new JwtSecurityTokenHandler() WriteToken error. #52369

Closed

  • Perf regression: https, json #52262
  • Perf regression: mvc #52370
  • Blazor WASM Hosted App Running Without Server Gets Ambiguous Error #42416
    Planning: WebUI
  • blazor ssr form processing issues #51978

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [UITesting] Add device logs to published bits #19038
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CollectionView snaps randomly when we give horizontal and vertical spacing #19037
  • Appium occasionally fails to install #19036
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Publish error when using generic class for DataType of DataTemplate in XAML #19035
  • ERROR WHILE COMPLETING THE .NET MUAI #19034
  • Maui Blazor Android cannot force loading addresses with query strings #19033
  • UnFocus does not work on Entries inside CollectionView. #19032

Closed

  • MAUI ios app not working/crashing after deployed to Testflight #19026

PullRequests

Updated

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fully support inline List (and other non-array) collections as inline collection query roots #32413
  • Constructor not found for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer #32411
  • Cosmos provider v7.0.14 and v8.0.0 breaks previous OwnsMany behaviour #32410

Closed

  • Join on OpenJson primitive collections #32407
  • How can I use built In-Memory Cache for INSERT queries? #32409

PullRequests

Created

  • Do nameof() over DateOnly instead of DateTime #32415
  • Allow empty inline collections #32414
  • Implement EF.Constant #32412
